issue.title: [C++] Adding Suffixes support for Substrait-Join
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16624](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16624). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment Substrait-Join integration is worked out in ARROW-15590. And the `suffix` support is not yet added to this since it is not part of Substrait spec. To expose the functionality Arrow-Substrait, some modifications to Substrait spec may be required.
